data.actual_result: The red bar doesn't disappear and Discord still registers you as in a call even though the app shows you not in the call
data.expected_result: The red bar at the top of the screen disappears
data.short_description: Discord registers you in call still
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a call or VC in Discord on your phone - Go to the homescreen on your phone while having Discord open in the background - Transfer the call to another device (I used my laptop) - Watch for the red bar showing you still connected to Discord to disappear
